zhousp writes:
[...]
> 2. After update from CVS, I set "accept-headers:" to "Content-Type:
>    text/html", it means I just want download text page,not image or .rm
>    file. But heritrix still crawle image file ,there are some .gif and
>    .jpg files in the ARC file.

That's not a valid value for the field: you need to specify a valid
accept header as defined in sections 14.1 -- 14.5 of HTTP specification:

        http://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616-sec14.html

Try adding

Accept: text/html

to the accept-headers: section: I have not tried this but I think it
will give you the result you expect.

    -tree
